name: Baker Assistant
description: Hire a baker to help out in the kitchen.

name: Oven Upgrade
description: Add a new oven to increase baking speed.

name: Cookie Cutter Pro
description: Use advanced cookie cutters for perfect cookies.

name: Packaging Machine
description: Automate packaging for faster delivery.

name: Factory Line Worker
description: Hire a factory worker for 24/7 baking.

name: High-Speed Oven
description: Install an oven that bakes at lightning speed.

name: Advanced Robotics
description: Deploy robots to bake and assemble cookies.

name: Nano-Assembly Line
description: Use nanotechnology to boost cookie production.

name: Quantum Bakers
description: Bakers who manipulate quantum states to bake.

name: Time Accelerator
description: Manipulate time to bake cookies faster.

name: Giant Dough Mixer
description: Mix enough dough for thousands of cookies at once.

name: Infinite Batter Generator
description: A perpetual machine that never runs out of batter.

name: Cookie AI
description: An AI dedicated to perfecting cookie recipes.

name: Hyperactive Bakers
description: Bakers fueled by endless energy to never stop.

name: Antimatter Oven
description: Bake cookies with the power of antimatter.

name: Dark Chocolate Forge
description: Forge cookies from the densest dark chocolate.

name: Starlight Mill
description: Grind flour from starlight for cosmic cookies.

name: Cosmic Bakers
description: Bakers who craft cookies from galaxies.

name: Celestial Oven
description: An oven powered by the heart of a star.

name: Black Hole Batter
description: Harvest batter from the edge of a black hole.

name: Multiverse Cookie Factory
description: Create cookies across infinite dimensions.

name: Time-Lord Bakers
description: Bakers who control time to mass-produce cookies.

name: Ethereal Cookie Spirits
description: Spirits that whisper recipes from beyond the veil.

name: Galactic Bakery
description: A bakery that spans across galaxies.

name: Big Bang Cookies
description: Generate cookies from the energy of creation itself.
